name: Risky Wings - Techno Soundtrack
detailed_description:
Alternative 'techno' soundrack (to be selected via Settings | Music Style).

Track list :
01 Menu Theme ~ techno remix (4:23)
02 UberFlight ~ techno remix (5:57)
03 Blue Stones ~ techno remix (7:47)
04 White Fog ~ techno remix (6:25)
05 Wingtip Vortices ~ techno remix (4:10)
06 Avionics ~ techno remix (5:59)
07 Asteroids ~ Techno Remix (06:19)
08 Advance ~ Techno Remix (06:10)
09 Emerald Green ~ Techno Remix (05:58)
10 Mystical Forest ~ Techno Remix (06:33)
11 Pilot Courage ~ Techno Remix (06:06)
12 Dark Matter ~ Techno Remix (30:26)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1
  • Processor: Core-i5
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core-i7
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
